dialogue.text: L-look, it hurts enough to stay here after someone never shows up.
Even though it's happened dozens of times... trying just gets harder.
I should've just gone home...\nI could be eating a tub of ice cream until I get sick...
But instead I'm ruining everything for\neveryone else...
God, I'm such a bitch...\nNo wonder nobody loves me...
But I've been so selfish already, so...
P- please, just let me have this...!
